title: Initial implementation for render-target concept (win32 sw-only)
body:
Initial code for #24. 

For now I'm struggling a bit with building opengl-renderer support (your scripts are skipping ANGLE build for some reason, so I need more time), so stub is used instead.

comments.body:
Hi all, any feedback on this PR? We'd like to get our skia backend in [Perspex](https://github.com/Perspex/Perspex) using Skia# and this was intended as a first step.

Or if you already have plans for something to cover this, please let us know.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Thanks for this PR, but before I merge this in I want to have a look at getting the GPU bits working for all the platforms - this includes OpenGL and DX/ANGLE for Windows. 

Right now, I am looking at other issues in SkiaSharp as well as updating our Skia to the "latest", or rather m52. Once this is done, I will start on the GPU/render targets.

WRT the update, I am nearly done. I just have a few kinks to work out with Android ARMv6 and th new dependencies that Google has introduced
